Address.value: 1050 DEARBORN DRIVE, COLUMBUS, Ohio, 43085, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vertiv Holdings Co brings together hardware, software, analytics and ongoing services to ensure its customers' vital applications run continuously, perform optimally and grow with their business needs. The company solves the important challenges faced by data centers, communication networks and commercial and industrial facilities with a portfolio of power, cooling and IT infrastructure solutions and services that extends from the cloud to the edge of the network. Its services include critical power, thermal management, racks and enclosures, monitoring and management, and other services. Its three business segments include Americas, Asia Pacific; and Europe, Middle East & Africa.
